feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-06-11T15:57:53.458428Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;荷兰政府希望自动获得针对黑客受害者的许可</stitle>; <id>;https://berthub.eu/articles/posts/dutch-intel-law-about-intel /</id>; <updated>;2023-06-11T14:57:29.276705Z</updated>; <link href="https://berthub.eu/articles/posts/dutch-intel-law-about-intel/" />; <author>; <name>;croes</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=croes</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img 源="https://berthub.eu/articles/logo3.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：207px；" />;<br />;荷兰政府正在提议一项新法律，自动将逮捕令扩展到黑客攻击受害者，允许情报和安全部门在未经进一步批准的情况下拦截他们的通信或入侵他们。这一增加显着改变了许多权力的范围，也扩大了它们的适用范围，在这些新权力中造成了紧张。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-dutch-government-wants-automatic-permission-to-target-victims-of-hackers" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36281543" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Tradecraft 入门 (2009)</stitle>; <id>;https://www.cia.gov/resources/csi/ books-monographs/a-tradecraft-primer/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T14:57:29.277240Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.cia.gov/resources/csi/ books-monographs/a-tradecraft-primer/"/>; <author>; <name>;greenyouse</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=greenyuse</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;这篇文章是 CIA 分析人员使用分析技术应对情报挑战的入门读物，包括不完整的信息和国际发展的复杂性。它强调了理解对手的意图和能力的难度，以及涉及多个参与者的跨国威胁的复杂性增加。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-tradecraft-primer-2009" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator。 com/item?id=36281945" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml" >; <title type="text">;心理流动性</stitle>; <id>;https://collabfund.com/blog/mental-liquidity/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-11T12:57:29.277637Z< /updated>; <link href="https://collabfund.com/blog/mental-liquidity/"/>; <author>; <name>;bkohlmann</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user ?id=bkohlmann</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;文章讨论了心理流动性的重要性，即在出现新信息时迅速放弃先前信念的能力。作者强调了改变想法的困难和过分坚持信念的危险。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#mental-liquidity" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item? id=36280772" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;JDK 21 的“冻结”功能列表的简要概述</stitle>; <author>; <name>;mooreds</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mooreds< /uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-compact-overview-of-jdk-21s-frozen-feature-list" 目标="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36282076" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;CS:GO：从零到零日</stitle>; <id >;https://neodyme.io/blog/csgo_from_zero_to_0day/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T07:57:29.278413Z</更新>; <link href="https://neodyme.io/blog/csgo_from_zero_to_0day /"/>; <author>; <name>;披萨</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pizza</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; img src="https://neodyme.io/assets/csgo.f41c0e91_1Aeymb.png" style="宽度：220px； height: 124px;" />;<br />;在热门游戏《反恐精英：全球攻势》中发现了三个严重的远程代码执行漏洞，这些漏洞可以在游戏客户端连接到恶意服务器时触发，并进行了概念验证漏洞被提出。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#cs-go-from-zero-to-0-day" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36279129" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;孢子统计</stitle>; <id>;http://www.spore.com/rest/stats</id>; <updated>;2023- 06-11T08:57:29.278784Z</updated>; <link href="http://www.spore.com/rest/stats"/>; <author>; <name>;DangerousYams</name>; <uri>;https:/ /news.ycombinator.com/user?id=DangerousYams</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;1913403673435594319117 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#spore-stats" 目标="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36279341" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;机器人可以从 RAM 芯片中提取数据</stitle>; <id>; https://www.theregister.com/2023/06/09/cold_boot_ram_theft/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T10:57:29.279169Z</更新>; <link href="https://www. theregister.com/2023/06/09/cold_boot_ram_theft/"/>; <作者>; <name>;laktak</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=laktak</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://regmedia.co.uk/2023/06/08/cryorobot_image.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;研究人员开发了一种内存窃取机，它可以通过一次冻结设备上的一个 RAM 芯片来从 DDR3 内存模块中提取解密数据。这种机器的成本约为 2,000 美元，它简化了冷启动攻击技术，使其不那么繁重。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#robot-can-rip-the-data-out-of-ram-chips" target="_blank">; [总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36254073" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; < entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;这是有效的 Python 语法</stitle>; <id>;https://www.bitecode.dev /p/this-is-valid-python-syntax</id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T11:57:29.279535Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.bitecode.dev/p/ this-is-valid-python-syntax"/>; <author>; <name>;ankitg12</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ankitg12</uri>; </author>; < content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_120,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-后媒体。 s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2Ffe596e59-4010-422a-b4f7-df7531fd4eca_948x948.png" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;本文讨论了 Python 中 splat 运算符 (*) 的各种用法，包括解包参数、可变参数和解包 iterables。它还探讨了下划线在数字文字和 f- 中的使用允许任意代码的字符串。作者指出，虽然这些功能可能很强大，但如果过度使用它们也会使代码不可读。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#this-is-valid-python- syntax" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36280214" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;< /content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;从工程师成长为经理</stitle>; <id>;https ://newsletter.eng-leadership.com/p/growing-from-engineer-to-manager</id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T08:57:29.279924Z</更新>; <link href="https: //newsletter.eng-leadership.com/p/growing-from-engineer-to-manager"/>; <author>; <name>;gregorojstersek</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user? id=gregorojstersek</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/ https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F02e31056-2e85-447c-bb17-7d009f98e8c4_800x327.jpeg" style="width: 220px; height: 90px;" />;<br />;本文讨论了从工程师转变为经理所需的心态和技能。作者采访了 Namecheap 的云总监 Nicola Ballota，他分享了他的经验和建议进行切换。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#growing-from-engineer-to-manager" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https ://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36279323" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;破坏苹果著名 iPhone 安全性的湾区德国酒吧</stitle>; <id>;https://www.sfgate.com/tech/article/bay -area-german-bar-iphone-security-breach-18130468.php</id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T09:57:29.280367Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.sfgate. com/tech/article/bay-area-german-bar-iphone-security-breach-18130468.php"/>; <author>; <name>;wallflower</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/用户？id=wallflower</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://s.hdnux.com/photos/01/23/54/65/21941575/3/ 1200x0.jpg" style="宽度: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;2010 年，一位醉酒的 Apple 软件工程师将 iPhone 4 原型机留在德国啤酒馆内的高脚凳上，随后被盗并以 5,000 美元的价格卖给了科技博客 Gizmodo。该事件引起了媒体狂热和对当时首席执行官史蒂夫乔布斯勒索的指控。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-bay-area-german-bar-that-brought-down-apples-famed-iphone-安全" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36270802" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;< /content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我创建了 Clippy [视频]</stitle>; <id>; https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3kcQzCzSDvc</id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T10:57:29.280747Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.youtube.com /watch?v=3kcQzCzSDvc"/>; <author>; <name>;rhema</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rhema</uri>; </author>; <content type= "html">;<iframe src="//www.youtube.com/embed/3kcQzCzSDvc" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen loading="lazy">;</iframe>; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat. io/#i-created-clippy-video" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36257935" target="_blank" >;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;一次旅行1996 年的互联网与粗略指南 2.0</stitle>; <id>;https://www.planetjones.net/blog/10-06-2023/a-trip-to-the-internet-in-1996-with-the -rough-guide-2.0.html</id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T11:57:29.281110Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.planetjones.net/blog/10-06- 2023/a-trip-to-the-internet-in-1996-with-the-rough-guide-2.0.html"/>; <author>; <name>;planetjones</name>; <uri>;https://news. ycombinator.com/user?id=planetjones</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static.planetjones.net/the-rough-guide/the-rough- guide-to-the-internet-book.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 242px;" />;<br />;作者回顾了 1996 年互联网和万维网的状态，如袖珍书《粗略指南 2.0》中所述。该书涵盖互联网速度、设备、社交媒体、电子商务、在线广告和通信方式等主题，让您一窥互联网的早期。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a -trip-to-the-internet-in-1996-with-the-rough-guide-2-0" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator .com/item?id=36280393" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml ">; <title type="text">;开源的不对称性</stitle>; <id>;https://matt.life/writing/the-asymmetry-of-open-source</id>; <updated>;2023- 06-11T08:57:29.281481Z</updated>; <link href="https://matt.life/writing/the-asymmetry-of-open-source"/>; <author>; <name>;ingve</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ingve</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://matt.life/resources/images /macbook-cover.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 125px;" />;<br />;开源的不对称性是可持续性问题的核心。虽然项目需要用户创建社区并在代码上进行协作，但没有它们它们仍然可以运行。本文讨论了不同的类型开源工作的重要性以及维护者和用户之间建立健康关系以确保可持续性的必要性。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-asymmetry-of-open-source" target="_blank">; [总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36279403" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; < entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;可搜索和排序的 H1B 工资数据库</stitle>; <id>;https://jobsort.com/ h1b</id>; <updated>;2023-06-11T03:57:29.281824Z</updated>; <link href="https://jobsort.com/h1b"/>; <author>; <name>;jobsort</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jobsort</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;H1B 数据已过滤，仅包括软件工程、生物医学、管理人员和首席执行官。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#searchable-and-sortable-h1b-salary-database" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36277706" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;在他成为 Unabomber 之前，Ted Kaczynski 是一名精神控制测试对象</stitle>; <id>;https://www.washingtonpost.com/history/2023/06 /11/unabomber-ted-kaczynski-harvard-experiment/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T09:57:29.282170Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.washingtonpost.com/history /2023/06/11/unabomber-ted-kaczynski-harvard-experiment/"/>; <author>; <name>;whitepaint</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=whitepaint< /uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.washingtonpost.com/wp-apps/imrs.php?src=https://arc-anglerfish-washpost- prod-washpost.s3.amazonaws.com/public/G7IS3TPAHWWIGQ6RXWNOJF7HTU.jpg&w=1440" style="宽度：220px；高度：155px；" />;<br />;Unabomber 泰德·卡钦斯基 (Ted Kaczynski) 是一名才华横溢的数学系学生，后来成为针对学术界和工业化社会的国内恐怖分子。他还是哈佛大学心理学家亨利·A·默里 (Henry A. Murray) 开展的一项实验的测试对象，该实验得到了中央情报局的支持，旨在了解如何控制受试者的思想。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#before-he-was-the-unabomber-ted-kaczynski-was-a-mind-control-test-subject" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36279639" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;奥本海默的情妇离奇死亡 (2015)</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.nuclearsecrecy .com/2015/12/11/the-curious-death-of-oppenheimers-mistress/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T03:57:29.282531Z</更新>; <link href="https:/ /blog.nuclearsecrecy.com/2015/12/11/the-curious-death-of-oppenheimers-mistress/"/>; <author>; <name>;benbreen</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator。 com/user?id=benbreen</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://blog.nuclearsecrecy.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/Jean- Tatlock.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：88px；" />;<br />;曼哈顿最新一集 209 与让·塔特洛克 (Jean Tatlock) 相关的次要情节联系在一起，他可能已被为曼哈顿计划安全工作的情报人员谋杀。奥本海默与塔特洛克的故事得到了详细探讨，包括奥本海默在 1943 年秘密访问塔特洛克，当时情报人员正在跟踪这次访问。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-curious-death-of-oppenheimers-mistress-2015" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36277696" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat。 io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;小网站小奖</stitle>; <id>;https://tinyawards.net/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-11T03:57: 29.282881Z</updated>; <link href="https://tinyawards.net/"/>; <author>; <name>;noflag</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id= noflag</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://asset.mmm.page/13/54757e3d654172a6eaf2f6ce16aa33/17ur1tz.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：230px ;" />;<br />;The Tiny Awards 是一个非商业奖项，由一个小型评选委员会颁发给体现小型、真诚网络理念的网站。获胜者将获得实物奖杯和 500 美元的现金奖励。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#tiny-awards-for-small-websites" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36267362" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;Total recall: the people who never forget (2017)</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theguardian.com/science/2017/feb/08/total-recall -the-people-who-never-forget</id>; <updated>;2023-06-11T07:57:29.283236Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.theguardian.com/science/2017/ feb/08/total-recall-the-people-who-never-forget"/>; <author>; <name>;bookofjoe</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=bookofjoe< /uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://i.guim.co.uk/img/media/9d3e91c957a5c51b49022cc4c29a215c133653df/0_114_3048_1829/master/3048.jpg?width=465&quality= 85&dpr=1&s=none" style="宽度：220px；高度：132px；" />;<br />;Jill Price 有一种称为高度自传体记忆 (HSAM) 的疾病，这使她能够非常详细地记住她生命中的大部分日子。她是第一个被诊断出患有这种疾病的人，现在已知这种疾病会影响大约 60 个人。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#total-recall-the-people-who-never-forget-2017" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36275943" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;封闭形式的 2×2 矩阵的幂</stitle>; <id>;https://www.johndcook.com/blog/2023/06/ 03/矩阵权力/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T10:57:29.283590Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.johndcook.com/blog/2023/06/03/ matrix-powers/"/>; <author>; <name>;KqAmJQ7</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=KqAmJQ7</uri>; </author>; <content type="html "<img src="https://www.johndcook.com/jdc_20170630.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;2x2 矩阵的幂有一个简单的封闭形式，推导只占一页。 2x2 矩阵的特征值可以使用 jingle 找到，有时会产生非常简单的值。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#powers-of-a-2x2-matrix-in-closed-form" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36280055" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：OpenObserve – Elasticsearch/Datadog 替代品</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/openobserve/openobserve</id>; <updated >;2023-06-11T12:57:29.283935Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/openobserve/openobserve"/>; <author>; <name>;prabhatsharma</name>; <uri>;https: //news.ycombinator.com/user?id=prabhatsharma</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/openobserve/openobserve/main/ screenshots/zo_intro_youtube.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：128px；" />;<br />;OpenObserve 是一个云原生可观察性平台，专为日志、指标、跟踪和分析而设计，与 Elasticsearch/Splunk/Datadog 相比，它提供高性能、PB 规模和更低的存储成本。它易于操作，可以用作 Elasticsearch 的直接替代品。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-openobserve-elasticsearch-datadog-alternative" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36280028" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Merklizing key/value store for fun and profit</stitle>; <id>;https://joelgustafson.com/posts/2023-05-04/merklizing-the- key-value-store-for-fun-and-profit</id>; <updated>;2023-06-11T02:57:29.284292Z</updated>; <link href="https://joelgustafson.com/posts/2023 -05-04/merklizing-the-key-value-store-for-fun-and-profit"/>; <author>; <name>;joelg</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user ?id=joelg</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://joelgustafson.com/posts/2023-05-04/Component%2017.png" style="宽度：220 像素；高度：80 像素；" />;<br />;本文讨论了使用 Prolly Trees（一种 Merkle 树）有效地比较两个键/值存储的内容并识别差异。此功能有多种应用，包括作为 CRDT 系统的持久层和去中心化数据库的基础。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#merklizing-the-key-value-store-for-fun-and-profit" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36265429" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;购买整个 Egghead 软件商店 (2005)</stitle>; <id>;https://devblogs.microsoft.com/oldnewthing/20050824-11 /?p=34463</id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T07:57:29.284647Z</更新>; <link href="https://devblogs.microsoft.com/oldnewthing/20050824-11/?p= 34463"/>; <author>; <name>;kaladin-jasnah</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=kaladin-jasnah</uri>; </author>; <content type=" html">;<img src="https://devblogs.microsoft.com/oldnewthing/wp-content/uploads/sites/38/2019/02/ShowCover.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：290px；" />;<br />;Windows 95 的开发经理在当地的 Egghead 软件商店购买了每个 PC 程序的副本，以确保应用程序的兼容性。 Windows 95 团队成员被邀请负责最多两个程序，作为交换，他们必须在 Windows 95 发布后保留它们。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#buying-an-entire-egghead-software-store-2005" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36274644" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;日本便利店一瞥</stitle>; <id>;https://one-from-nippon.ghost.io/combini-part-1/</ id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T04:57:29.285003Z</更新>; <link href="https://one-from-nippon.ghost.io/combini-part-1/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;kizunajp</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=kizunajp</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:/ /one-from-nippon.ghost.io/content/images/size/w960/2023/06/8169412114_70558fa758_k.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：147px；" />;<br />;日本的便利店以一尘不染、存货充足、24/7 全天候营业以及提供范围广泛的产品和服务着称，包括食品、饮料、酒类、音乐会门票和巴士预订。它们也是物流和技术效率的奇迹，具有集中采购、供应商管理和交付物流，以及数字系统和与其他服​​务的集成。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-peek-into-japan-s-convenience-stores" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36277962" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;现代生活是垃圾：陶林的台北（2013）</stitle>; <id>;https://themillions.com/2013/06/modern-life-is -rubbish-tao-lins-taipei.html</id>; <updated>;2023-06-11T05:57:29.285350Z</updated>; <link href="https://themillions.com/2013/06/modern- life-is-rubbish-tao-lins-taipei.html"/>; <author>; <name>;occurrence</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=occurrence</uri>; < /author>; <content type="html">;这篇文章是对陶林的小说《台北》的尖锐评论，批评其平淡无奇的散文和平淡无奇的用词。评论家最初讨厌这部小说，但最终对它对持续吸毒和人物情绪崩溃的描写表示赞赏。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#modern-life-is-rubbish-tao-lins-taipei-2013" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36265759" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;杂货店合并？不太好</stitle>; <id>;https://waterwrights.net/grocery-mergers-not-so-good-january-16-2023/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-11T01:57:29.285695 Z</updated>; <link href="https://waterwrights.net/grocery-mergers-not-so-good-january-16-2023/"/>; <author>; <name>;luu</name>; <uri >;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=luu</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;此帐户已被暂停。有关详细信息，请联系您的托管服务提供商。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#grocery-mergers-not-so-good" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36264717" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;今年夏天我从 OpenSnitch 中学到了什么？</stitle>; <id>;https://people.skolelinux.org/pere/blog/What_did_I_learn_from_OpenSnitch_this_summer_.html</id>; <updated >;2023-06-11T06:57:29.286038Z</updated>; <link href="https://people.skolelinux.org/pere/blog/What_did_I_learn_from_OpenSnitch_this_summer_.html"/>; <author>; <name>;pabs3</name >; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pabs3</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;OpenSnitch 是一种交互式应用程序防火墙，现在可供更广泛的受众使用Debian 12 Bookworm 的发布。这篇文章的作者已经使用了几周，并且对某些连接到互联网的程序感到惊讶，促使建议测试 OpenSnitch 以定位和报告台式机上任何令人惊讶的互联网连接。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#what-did-i-learn-from-opensnitch-this-summer" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36278874" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;农业技术应对气候变化威胁</stitle>; <id>;https://www.wsj.com/articles/climate-change-will-upend -agriculture-here-are-five-technologies-that-c​​ould-help-b854770f</id>; <updated>;2023-06-11T06:57:29.286381Z</updated>; <link href="https://www. wsj.com/articles/climate-change-will-upend-agriculture-here-are-five-technologies-that-c​​ould-help-b854770f"/>; <author>; <name>;lxm</name>; <uri>;https: //news.ycombinator.com/user?id=lxm</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://images.wsj.net/im-792993/?width =1278&size=1" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;气候变化对农业构成重大威胁，包括降雨量更大、冬天更严酷以及致病虫害。科学家预测，这些挑战将导致水土流失、生长条件发生变化以及害虫范围扩大。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#farming-technologies-tackle-climate-change-threats" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36266895" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;CIA 2010 秘密通信网站</stitle>; <id>;https://cirosantilli.com/cia-2010-covert-communication-websites</id>; <updated>;2023 -06-11T08:57:29.286732Z</updated>; <link href="https://cirosantilli.com/cia-2010-covert-communication-websites"/>; <author>; <name>;hosteur</name>; < uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=hosteur</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cirosantilli/ media/master/cia-2010-covert-communication-websites/screenshots/feedsdemexicoyelmundo.com.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：159px；" />;<br />;文章讨论了中央情报局在 2000 年代末至 2010 年代初使用的秘密通信渠道网站，直到被目标国家发现，导致数项资产被监禁和处决。这篇文章提供了有关网站数量及其用途的信息，以及为发现更多此类网站所做的努力。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#cia-2010-covert-communication-websites" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36279375" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;Covid 前几周的武汉实验室内</stitle>; <id>;https://www.thetimes.co.uk/article/inside-wuhan-lab-covid-pandemic-china -america-qhjwwwvm0</id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T01:57:29.287083Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.thetimes.co.uk/article/inside-wuhan-lab- covid-pandemic-china-america-qhjwwwvm0"/>; <author>; <name>;ricksunny</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ricksunny</uri>; </author>; < content type="html">;<img src="https://www.thetimes.co.uk/imageserver/image/%2Fmethode%2Fsundaytimes%2Fprod%2Fweb%2Fbin%2F5aedcbf4-06ec-11ee-a1e5-6222cf71d60e.jpg ?crop=1575%2C886%2C0%2C0&resize=360" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;在 Covid-19 大流行开始之际，中国武汉的科学家们正在进行危险的实验，将致命的冠状病毒结合起来创造一种新的变异病毒。据称，这些实验由中国军方资助，并对公众保密。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#inside-the-wuhan-lab-weeks-before-covid" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36276268" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;奶酪、老鼠和吉芬商品</stitle>; <id>;https://timharford.com/2023/06/the-cheese-the-rats-and -为什么我们中的一些人比其他人穷/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T04:57:29.287434Z</更新>; <link href="https://timharford.com /2023/06/the-cheese-the-rats-and-why-some-of-us-are-poorer-than-others/"/>; <author>; <name>;background</name>; <uri>;https: //news.ycombinator.com/user?id=background</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://timharford.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/ 01/Back_View-DD@0.5x-1-1024x654.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：141px；" />;<br />;1990年，实验室老鼠被用来证明吉芬商品的存在，吉芬商品是由于消费者被逼到墙角而价格上涨时被消费得更多的商品。 Economists later found that rice in the poorest parts of Hunan, China, was a Giffen good. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#cheese-rats-and-giffen-goods" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36265786" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
